resources.string: Start sharing your story! Please log in to begin your journey.
Join %1$s today and unleash your storytelling potential!
Create an account now and start crafting your own narrative. Your adventure awaits!
Don\'t have an account yet? %1$s and start sharing your stories with us!
Already have an account? %1$s and continue your storytelling journey with us!
Please enter your name address to proceed.
Please enter your email address to proceed.
Please enter your password to proceed.
Congratulations! Your account has been successfully created.
You can now log in and start exploring our platform. \n Press \'Continue\' to proceed to the login page.
